correctness.rationale: Major schema violations and many untraceable/fabricated values. Key issues: (1) ALD method wrong: pO and WpO should be PEALD, not TALD. (2) Schema unit errors: growthPerCycle must use ANGSTROM (Å) but nm is used; dosingTime/purgeTime require MilliSEC but SEC is used; absorptionCoefficient must be unitless per schema but PER-CentiM is used; filmDensity unit must be GM-PER-DeciM3 but GM-PER-CentiM3 is used. (3) Invalid/null fields: plasmaPower is null in the W (thermal) process—property should be omitted if not used; extra filmThickness at the top level of processParameters violates additionalProperties: false. (4) Incomplete co-reactant dosing for WpO: only H2O time is given (15 s), missing the O2 plasma dose (8 s) reported. (5) Numerous values not traceable to the article: reactor pressure (20 mTorr), all flowRates, optical properties (n, α, band gap and UV-Vis method), electrical properties (resistivity, carrier density, mobility, Hall), uniformity, conformality, roughness, deviceProperties, filmDensity value (5.6 g/cm3), and safety/reproducibility claims. (6) Composition: atomic ratio 1:1 is consistent with stoichiometric HR-RBS, but the elementalConcentration 50% with XPS is not reported; composition methods in the paper are HR-RBS and D-SIMS. Corrections: set aldMethod to PEALD for pO and WpO and TALD for W; fix all units to match schema (Å for GPC, ms for times, unitless for absorptionCoefficient, GM-PER-DeciM3 for density); remove unreported pressure/flow/optical/electrical/device/uniformity/conformality/roughness values; remove top-level filmThickness in processParameters; omit plasmaPower in the W process; add the 8 s O2 plasma co-reactant time for WpO; cite HR-RBS for stoichiometry and D-SIMS for impurities.

completeness.rationale: Major factual and schema issues. Positives: three distinct ZnO ALD processes (pO, W, WpO) are represented and some reported values are captured (200 °C, Ar carrier/purge with 15 s purges, 100 W plasma, precursor and co-reactant pulse times, GPCs, cycles and TEM film thicknesses). However: (1) ALD method misclassified: pO and WpO should be PEALD, not TALD; W can be TALD. (2) Units violate schema: growthPerCycle must be in Å (not nm); dosing and purge times must be in milliseconds (schema requires MilliSEC; values are given in seconds); filmDensity unit must be GM-PER-DeciM3 (not g/cm3). (3) Schema violations: plasmaPower is null in the H2O process (type mismatch); extra filmThickness field placed at processParameters level (not allowed). (4) Fabricated/unsupported values: reactor pressure (20 mTorr), all flow rates, optical properties, electrical properties, uniformity, conformality, roughness, XRR density, and all deviceProperties are not reported in the article; safety claim (“not pyrophoric”) is not explicitly stated for this precursor. (5) Missing/incorrect process details: delivery method should be ‘bubbler’ (article states a bubbler at 70 °C); substrate should note p-type Si(100) with native oxide; WpO co-reactant timing omits the O2 plasma step (8 s) and only lists H2O 15 s; crystallographic orientation differences (W: (002); pO: (103); WpO: intermediate) are not captured; impurity trends (C, H by D‑SIMS) are not represented. (6) Film density values are incorrect (article reports ~5.1–5.2 g/cm3 by HR‑RBS-derived calculation; extraction uses 5.6 and wrong unit/method). To improve: correct aldMethod (PEALD vs TALD), fix all units to schema (Å, ms, GM-PER-DeciM3), remove unsupported pressure/flows/optical/electrical/device metrics, add delivery method, specify substrate as p-type Si(100) with native oxide, include the 8 s O2 plasma step for WpO, update film density per article, and align composition/stoichiometry with HR‑RBS (O/Zn≈1) while noting impurity analysis.
